title: [Epic] - (Wallet) Add bridging feature for best route
body:
## User Story
- As a user, I would like to be able to bridge tokens from one network to another.
- I would like to be able to do this on prod and testnets.
- I am okay to work with just the best suggested route for the time being
- I would like to see the status of the transaction once it has been confirmed/failed
- I would like to see an estimation of how the gas fees will be and how much time it will take.
- on the transaction confirmation page I would like to know that I am bridging tokens 
- on the asset input page I would like to know that I am confirming a bridge transaction
